description: Variation of condition 1 of the planning permission dated 30th August 2019 (RN: 19/04575/FULL) for 'External shopfront alterations, installation of plant equipment in rear courtyard and associated works, all in connection with the subdivision of the ground and basement levels of 8/8A for use as two retail units (Class A1)'. Namely, to vary the drawings to allow amendments to the shop frontages including reduction in width of the front entrance doors, reduction in height of the glazed sections of the shopfronts, include high level natural ventilation grilles within the facade of the shopfronts and minor amendments to the internal layouts.
